T02TD2772E:145a-0: @145a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mchod sbyin mang po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2772E:145a-1: de nas snying rje chen po can chu gtor gyi mchod sbyin la mngon par dga' bas gang na ri dang thang dang 'bab chu dang ne'u gsing dang /
T02TD2772E:145a-2: lha khang dang phug la sogs pa ci rigs pa'i gnas su yo byad phun sum tshogs par byas nas bde ba'i yid dang ldan pas 'dug ste /
T02TD2772E:145a-3: gsum la skyabs su song nas brtsams te //
T02TD2772E:145a-4: byang chub mchog tu sems gzung bar //
T02TD2772E:145a-5: byams sogs tshangs pa'i gnas bcas pas //
T02TD2772E:145a-6: nges bar byas te cho ga brtsam //
T02TD2772E:145a-7: thams cad stong pa nyid dbyings las //
T02TD2772E:145a-8: padma zla dbus sa bon mtshan //
T02TD2772E:145a-9: yongs gyur sbyor bas lha mchog bskyed //
T02TD2772E:145a-10: phyag rgya sngags kyis yongs su bcing //
T02TD2772E:145a-11: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba //
T02TD2772E:145a-12: gnyis brkyang gung mo mdzub gnyis mdud //
T02TD2772E:145a-13: mthe bong rdo rje bsten sbyar la //
T02TD2772E:145a-14: spyi gtsug steng du gsal gzhag ste /
T02TD2772E:145a-15: na ma:sa manta buddha n'am badzra aushn'i sha h'um h'um /
T02TD2772E:145a-16: zhes bya bas gtsug tor gsal bar bya'o //
T02TD2772E:145a-17: rdo rje thal mo gnyis sbyar las //
T02TD2772E:145a-18: gung mo gnyis brkyang srin lag mdzub //
T02TD2772E:145a-19: rtse sbyar phan tshun khyud bskor nas //
T02TD2772E:145a-20: gtsug tor steng du gsal byas nas //
T02TD2772E:145a-21: aom a'a: hr'i:badzra aa mri te pasth'i ti h'um h'um /
T02TD2772E:145a-22: zhes bya bas 'od dpag med kyi cod pan bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2772E:145a-23: klu mchog chos 'chad las skyes pa //
T02TD2772E:145a-24: gung mo dang ni mthe bong gnyis //
T02TD2772E:145a-25: gshibs brkyang rtse mo lhan cig pa //
T02TD2772E:145a-26: dmigs la nye bar btud nas ni //
T02TD2772E:145a-27: aom a'a:hr'i:badzra dzny'a na tsakshu pra sa ka sa h'um /
T02TD2772E:145a-28: zhes bya bas ye shes kyi sbyan dang ldan pas gsal bar bya'o //
T02TD2772E:145a-29: lag gnyis mnyam pa'i thal sbyar bas //
T02TD2772E:145a-30: mdzub gnyis gung mo la mdud cing //
T02TD2772E:145a-31: mtheb gnyis gung mo la btud nas //
T02TD2772E:145a-32: lus kun kun tu bskor nyul bas //
T02TD2772E:145a-33: aom a'a:hr'i:badzra nam badzra tsakra bha ba wa ka pa te h'um /
T02TD2772E:145a-34: zhes bya bas rdo rje zhub kyi go bgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2772E:145a-36: rnam dag chos nyid rgya chen nam mkha' mdzod dang bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang /
T02TD2772E:145a-37: shugs chen skar mda' dbang du byed bshad rgyal ba spyan ras gzigs dbang rgya //
T02TD2772E:145a-38: sngags bcas grangs kyi dri dral bsam yas bdud rtsi'i mtsho chen sprin 'khrigs dang //
T02TD2772E:145b-0: dpag med lus kyis phun @145b tshogs mchod sprul ma lus ci rigs dgos dgur mchod //
T02TD2772E:145b-1: aom sva bh'a wa bi shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba bi shuddho nya\ham /
T02TD2772E:145b-2: nam: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
T02TD2772E:145b-3: bi shva mu khe bhya:sarba tatkhamautga te spha ra na hi mam ga ga na kham sv'a h'a /
T02TD2772E:145b-4: aom aa mram ta kunda li ha na ha na h'um /
T02TD2772E:145b-5: nam:sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te /
T02TD2772E:145b-7: aom dzny'a na aa ba lo ki te sa manta spha ra na ra smi bha b'a sa ma ya ma h'a ma ni du ru hri da ya dza la ni h'um /
T02TD2772E:145b-8: na ma:sa manta buddh'a n'am gra ha shva ri pra bh'a ba dzo ti ma h'a sa ma ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2772E:145b-9: nam:sarba ta th'a ga te ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya sva ra shr'i aa ba lo ki te ma h'a aa dhishth'a na dzva la n'a n'a p'u dza me gha spha ra na h'um /
T02TD2772E:145b-10: pam las pad snod rgya chen ni //
T02TD2772E:145b-11: 'bru gsum las gyur sna tshogs bcud //
T02TD2772E:145b-12: zab cing rgya che'i sngags phyag rgyas //
T02TD2772E:145b-13: byin brlabs de steng sman shing bskyed //
T02TD2772E:145b-14: aa dang ka sogs las grub pa //
T02TD2772E:145b-15: grub pa nyi shu sogs rdzas kyis //
T02TD2772E:145b-16: legs spras dam tshigs gtor ma la //
T02TD2772E:145b-17: ye shes bstims la ji bzhin mchod //
T02TD2772E:145b-18: dpal ldan thugs rje che stobs mthus //
T02TD2772E:145b-19: sri zhu yon tan phan 'dogs dang //
T02TD2772E:145b-20: snying rje'i gnas gyur ltos chags mgron //
T02TD2772E:145b-21: tshim byed mchod sbyin 'di rab bsngags //
T02TD2772E:145b-22: dpal thugs rje chen po'i chab gtor gyi cho ga rdzogs so//
